src: 新华社北京12月11日电（记者阳娜）记者从近日北京市教委、北京市人力资源和社会保障局联合召开的2022届北京高校毕业生就业创业工作视频会议上获悉，2022年北京地区高校毕业生预计达26.8万人，比去年增加1.6万人。
test: Xinhua News Agency Beijing, December 11 (Reporter Yangna) A reporter from the Beijing Municipal Education Commission and the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau recently learned from the 2022 Beijing Higher Education Graduate Employment and Entrepreneurship Work Video Conference jointly held by the two units that the number of graduates of Beijing universities in 2022 is expected to reach 26.8 million, an increase of 1.6 million over last year.
new_mt: Xinhua News Agency Beijing, December 11 (Reporter Yangna) A reporter from the Beijing Municipal Education Commission and the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau recently learned from the 2022 Beijing Higher Education Graduate Employment and Entrepreneurship Work Video Conference jointly held by the two units that the number of graduates of Beijing universities in 2022 is expected to reach 26.8 million, an increase of 1.6 million over last year.

src: 北京市人力资源和社会保障局相关负责人表示，将从加强供需匹配、强化政策支持、拓宽就业渠道、确保困难帮扶、支持创新创业、提升服务效能等方面部署北京高校毕业生就业工作。
test: The relevant person in charge of the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that they will strengthen the supply and demand matching, strengthen policy support, expand employment channels, ensure difficult assistance, support innovation and entrepreneurship, and improve service efficiency in the work of employment of graduates of Beijing universities.
new_mt: The relevant person in charge of the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that they will strengthen the supply and demand matching, strengthen policy support, expand employment channels, ensure difficult assistance, support innovation and entrepreneurship, and improve service efficiency in the work of employment of graduates of Beijing universities.

src: 让大学精神与时代精神同频共振-新华网
test: Let the university spirit and the spirit of the times resonate at the same frequency
new_mt: Let the university spirit and the spirit of the times resonate at the same frequency

src: 所谓大学精神，是指一所大学在发展过程中长期积淀形成的一系列办学理念和价值追求，是大学的灵魂所在。
test: The so-called university spirit, refers to a long-term accumulation of a series of university management concepts and values pursuit in the process of development, is the soul of the university.
new_mt: The so-called university spirit, refers to a long-term accumulation of a series of university management concepts and values pursuit in the process of development, is the soul of the university.

src: 从古至今，大学精神对于政治、经济、文化、科技、社会的发展，乃至一个民族的进步均至关重要。
test: From ancient times to the present, the spirit of university has played an important role in the development of politics, economy, culture, science and technology, and the progress of a nation.
new_mt: From ancient times to the present, the spirit of university has played an important role in the development of politics, economy, culture, science and technology, and the progress of a nation.

src: 从世界第一所现代意义上的大学诞生起，大学就肩负起不同于其他社会组织的独特使命，对于我国大学来说，兴起于民族危难之秋，其精神更是深受传统文化和时代变迁的影响，倡导“明德济世，修齐治平”的价值理念和“兴学强国”的爱国主义担当。
retrieved_src: 民建中央秘书长陈明德指出，白皮书是中国政府进一步向国际社会阐述有关一个中国原则立场和政策的文告，也是中国人民决心早日解决台湾问题、实现祖国完全统一的宣示。
retrieved_ref: Chen Mingde,general secretary of the Central Committee of the China Democratic National Construction Association,pointed out : The white paper is a document in which the Chinese government has further explained its one-China principle and policy to the international community,and it is also a declaration that the Chinese people are determined to settle the Taiwan issue and realize the complete reunification of the motherland at an early date.
new_mt: From the birth of the first modern university in the world, the university has assumed a unique mission different from other social organizations. For Chinese universities, it was born in the autumn of national crisis, and its spirit has been deeply influenced by traditional culture and the changes of the times. It advocates the value concept of "Benefiting the world and promoting peace" and the patriotic mission of "Strengthening the country through education".

src: 当前，高等教育信息化、国际化趋势日益明显，全球范围的教育竞争、科技竞争、人才竞争不断加剧，高等教育事业作为重要的“供给侧 ” ， 其结构性改革正面临前所未有的机遇和挑战。
test: The current trend of informationization and internationalization of higher education is becoming more and more obvious, the global competition of education, technology and talent is constantly intensifying, and the higher education industry as an important "supply side" is facing unprecedented opportunities and challenges in its structural reform.
new_mt: The current trend of informationization and internationalization of higher education is becoming more and more obvious, the global competition of education, technology and talent is constantly intensifying, and the higher education industry as an important "supply side" is facing unprecedented opportunities and challenges in its structural reform.

src: 尤其是《统筹推进世界一流大学和一流学科建设总体方案》的提出，在展示了我国从高等教育大国向高等教育强国迈进的信心和决心的同时，更是对大学发展提出了更高更新的要求。
test: In particular, the proposal to advance the construction of world-class universities and world-class disciplines in the "General Plan for the Coordinated Development of World-Class Universities and World-Class Disciplines" has shown our country's confidence and determination in advancing from a great power in higher education to a strong power in higher education. At the same time, it also puts forward higher and more stringent requirements for university development.
new_mt: In particular, the proposal to advance the construction of world-class universities and world-class disciplines in the "General Plan for the Coordinated Development of World-Class Universities and World-Class Disciplines" has shown our country's confidence and determination in advancing from a great power in higher education to a strong power in higher education. At the same time, it also puts forward higher and more stringent requirements for university development.

src: 如何在较短时间内努力跻身世界一流行列，在仍有一定差距的基础上加快建成若干所世界一流大学和一批世界一流学科，实现“弯道超车 ” ？
test: How to quickly climb to the world's first-class ranks in a short time, while still having a certain gap, to build a few world-class universities and a batch of world-class disciplines, to achieve "bending the car"?
new_mt: How to quickly climb to the world's first-class ranks in a short time, while still having a certain gap, to build a few world-class universities and a batch of world-class disciplines, to achieve "bending the car"?

src: 除了坚定目标自信、路径自信、能力自信，高校还应当充分发挥三种优势：一是后发优势，通过持续引进海外杰出学术人才，学习借鉴世界一流大学的先进经验，实现学术水平和办学质量的显著提升；二是文化优势，继承中华文明在五千年积淀的智慧内涵，弘扬发展优秀传统文化，以此来凝聚力量、塑造品牌、提升形象；三是制度优势，发挥社会主义国家的制度优越性，强化目标驱动，汇集共识合力，优化资源配置，为学校加速赶超世界先进水平提供可持续的坚实保障。

src: 习近平指出，当今世界正经历百年未有之大变局，全球科技创新进入密集活跃期，新一轮科技革命和产业变革对全球经济结构产生了深刻影响。
retrieved_src: 20世纪是人类文明经过几千年量的积累向质的巨变飞跃的阶段，在短短百年内，人类社会生活的各个方面都发生了频繁而剧烈的变化。
retrieved_ref: The 20th century is a stage which has witnessed human civilization going through an enormous change and leap to quality from quantity accumulation over several thousand years. In a short period of one-hundred years,frequent and radical changes have taken place in every aspect of the social life of mankind.
new_mt: Xi Jinping pointed out that the world is currently undergoing a great change unprecedented in a century, and the global technological innovation is entering a period of intense activity. The new round of technological revolution and industrial transformation has a profound impact on the global economic structure.

src: 粤港澳大湾区要围绕建设国际科技创新中心战略定位，努力建设全球科技创新高地，推动新兴产业发展。

src: 中国愿同世界各国科学家、国际科技组织一道，密切国际科技交流合作，加强重大科学问题研究，促进共性科学技术破解，深化重点科学项目协作，共同推进世界科学事业发展，更好造福人类。

src: 新华社华盛顿５月２３日电（记者徐剑梅）美国１３０多个亚裔团体２３日向美国教育部和司法部提交申诉，抗议３所常春藤名校 — — 耶鲁大学、布朗大学和达特茅斯学院在招生过程中歧视亚裔申请学生。
retrieved_src: 新华社北京７月２日电（记者廖翊）“七·七”事变６５周年前夕，由中国人民抗日战争纪念馆主编的《誓不臣倭——台湾人民抗日史》一书在北京出版。
retrieved_ref: Xinhua News Agency,Beijing,July 2(Reporter Liao Yi)On the eve of the 65th anniversary of July 7 Incident, a book entitled Never Yield to Japs : A History of Taiwanese People 's Resistance Against Japan chiefly compiled by Museum of Chinese People 's War against Japan has been published in Beijing.
new_mt: Xinhua News Agency,Washington,May 23(Reporter Xu Jianmei) More than 130 Asian-American organizations in the United States submitted a petition to the U.S. Department of Education and the Department of Justice on May 23, protesting against the discrimination against Asian-American applicants in the admission process of three Ivy League universities -- Yale University, Brown University and Dartmouth College.

src: 牵头发起申诉的亚裔教育联盟当天在华盛顿召开新闻发布会。
test: The Asian American Education League, which initiated the lawsuit, held a press conference in Washington on the day of the lawsuit.
new_mt: The Asian American Education League, which initiated the lawsuit, held a press conference in Washington on the day of the lawsuit.

src: 该团体主席赵宇空在发布会上说，过去１０年里，符合美国名校录取条件的亚裔申请人数量成倍增长，但在这３所美国名校中，亚裔所占比例基本维持在同一水平。
test: The president of the organization Zhao Yuchun said at the press conference that in the past ten years, the number of Asian applicants who meet the admission criteria of American universities has increased by ten times, but in these three American universities, the proportion of Asians has basically remained at the same level.
new_mt: The president of the organization Zhao Yuchun said at the press conference that in the past ten years, the number of Asian applicants who meet the admission criteria of American universities has increased by ten times, but in these three American universities, the proportion of Asians has basically remained at the same level.

src: 许多研究表明，这些高校在所谓“综合考量”的招生过程中 ， “ 长期持续性以及系统化地歧视亚裔申请学生 ” 。
test: Many studies have shown that these universities in the so-called "comprehensive consideration" of the admission process, "long-term and systematic discrimination against Asian applicants"
new_mt: Many studies have shown that these universities in the so-called "comprehensive consideration" of the admission process, "long-term and systematic discrimination against Asian applicants"

src: 赵宇空介绍说，２０１４年桑德斯等学者的研究显示，在这３所高校里，相对申请者人数，亚裔在所有族裔中录取率最低。
retrieved_src: 这项法案旨在扩大阿尔巴尼亚裔居民在首都等主要城市的代表权,也是涵盖在欧洲联盟支持的奥里德和平协定里的部分条件。
retrieved_ref: The bill is designed to expand the representation of ethnic Albanian citizens in major cities including the capital,and is also part of the terms in the EU-backed Ohrid peace accord.
new_mt: Zhao Yuchen introduced that the research of Sanders et al. in 2014 showed that among the three universities, the acceptance rate of Asian applicants was the lowest among all ethnic groups.

src: 美国教育部的数据也显示，在所有常春藤盟校中，布朗大学和达特茅斯学院对亚裔学生的录取比例最低，耶鲁大学和布朗大学对亚裔申请学生实施了事实上的种族配额达２０年以上。
test: Data from the U.S. Department of Education also shows that among all Ivy League schools, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest admission rates for Asian students, while Yale University and Brown University have been practicing de facto racial quotas for more than 20 years.

src: 赵宇空告诉新华社记者，他们期望提交申诉后，美国教育部、司法部能够展开调查，并在认定事实后采取措施阻止这些高校继续在招生中歧视亚裔。
test: Zhao Yuchen told the reporter of Xinhua News Agency that they hope to submit an appeal after the investigation, and the US Department of Education and the Department of Justice can carry out an investigation and determine the facts after the investigation, and take measures to stop these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in the admission process.

src: 目前，被投诉的３所高校尚未作出回应。

test: The Asian American Education Alliance was founded in 2015, when it filed a complaint with the U.S. Department of Education against Harvard University for discriminating against Asian-American applicants. However, the U.S. Department of Education rejected the complaint on procedural grounds.

src: 我们隆重庆祝中国共产党成立一百周年，正式宣布全面建成小康社会、实现第一个百年奋斗目标，开启全面建设社会主义现代化国家、向第二个百年奋斗目标进军新征程。

The Chinese people becamethe masters of the new country,new society. Erasing the humiliation of a century,the Chinese people stood tall among the ranks of nations.

src: 我们召开党的十九届六中全会，总结党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验，通过百年党史上第三个历史决议《中共中央关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议 》 ， 这是新时代中国共产党人牢记初心使命、坚持和发展中国特色社会主义的政治宣言，是以史为鉴、开创未来、实现中华民族伟大复兴的行动指南。

We will summarize the great achievements and historical experience of the Party's hundred-year struggle, and make a third historical resolution on the great achievements and historical experience of the Party's hundred-year struggle. This is a political declaration of the new era of Chinese Communists, a political declaration of the Chinese Communist Party's commitment to the mission, perseverance and development of socialism with Chinese characteristics, and a guide for action to realize the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.

src: 一年来，世界百年未有之大变局和新冠肺炎疫情全球大流行交织影响，外部环境更趋复杂严峻，国内新冠肺炎疫情防控和经济社会发展各项任务极为繁重艰巨。

src: 以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚持统筹国内国际两个大局，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，沉着应对百年变局和世纪疫情，统筹疫情防控和经济社会发展，加快构建新发展格局，强化宏观政策跨周期调节，着力促进经济持续健康发展，着力深化改革开放创新，奋力完成改革发展艰巨任务，党和国家各项事业取得了新的重大成就。

test: When meeting, Kweisi Chi, the Chinese ambassador to Poland, actively evaluated the China-Poland relations and said that he had visited China in 2008 during the Beijing Olympic Games, and he had a deep impression on the excellent organization of the Chinese side. src: 青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量今年增加0.71万吨-新华网
test: Qinghai Lake carp resource reserve increased by 71,000 tons this year-Xinhua Net
new_mt: Qinghai Lake carp resource reserve increased by 71,000 tons this year-Xinhua Net

src: 新华社西宁12月11日电（记者骆晓飞、张宏祥）记者从青海省农业农村厅获悉，最新监测结果显示，青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量今年较上年增加0.71万吨,达到10.85万吨，与2002年保护初期相比，累计增长40余倍。
test: Xinhua News Agency, December 11, 2003 (Reporter Luo Xiaofei, Zhang Hongxiang) Reporters from the Green Lake, Qinghai Province, learned from the Qinghai Provincial Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs that the latest monitoring results showed that the resource reserves of the naked carp in Qinghai Lake had increased by 0.71 tons this year, reaching 10.85 tons, which was 40 times higher than that in 2002 when the protection was first started.
new_mt: Xinhua News Agency, December 11, 2003 (Reporter Luo Xiaofei, Zhang Hongxiang) Reporters from the Green Lake, Qinghai Province, learned from the Qinghai Provincial Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs that the latest monitoring results showed that the resource reserves of the naked carp in Qinghai Lake had increased by 0.71 tons this year, reaching 10.85 tons, which was 40 times higher than that in 2002 when the protection was first started.

src: 青海湖裸鲤俗名“湟鱼 ” ， 是青海湖中特有的珍贵鱼种，对维系青海湖流域“水-鱼-鸟”生态链安全和生物多样性有着举足轻重的作用。
retrieved_src: 尾羽鸟是第一只发现长有原始羽毛的恐龙，孔子鸟则是第一只长有嘴喙的史前鸟类，辽西鸟是目前出土中身体最小的鸟类，它们均于辽西发现，距今逾一亿年，其发现使科学家对恐龙和鸟类演化关系的观念完全改变。
retrieved_ref: They are Sinosauropteryx,the first feathered dinosaur found in the world ; Liaoxiornis,the smallest prehistoric bird ever known ; Caudipteryx,the first dinosaur that possessed primitive feathers ; Confuciusornis,the first bird that possessed a beak ; and Huaxiasaurus,Dromaeosaurus,Protarchaeopteryx as well as Changchengornis.These exquisitely preserved skeletons bear remains of feathers,though only three of them - Changchengornis,Confuciusornis and Liaoxiornis - could actually fly. The discoveries of these fossils have revolutionized our understanding of the evolutionary relationship between dinosaurs and birds.
new_mt: The naked carp is a specialty of Qinghai Lake. It is a precious fish species in Qinghai Lake. It plays an important role in maintaining the ecological safety and biodiversity of the "water-fish-bird" ecological chain in the Qinghai Lake watershed.

src: 20世纪六七十年代，受人为大量捕杀、裸鲤繁殖水域环境日益退化等因素影响，青海湖裸鲤数量锐减，2002年青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量仅为2592吨。
test: In the 20th century, the massive killing and breeding of carp in the 1960s and 1970s, as well as the deterioration of the aquatic environment, led to a sharp decline in the number of carp in Qinghai Lake. In 2002, the resource reserve of Qinghai Lake carp was only 2592 tons.
new_mt: In the 20th century, the massive killing and breeding of carp in the 1960s and 1970s, as well as the deterioration of the aquatic environment, led to a sharp decline in the number of carp in Qinghai Lake. In 2002, the resource reserve of Qinghai Lake carp was only 2592 tons.

src: 2004年在《中国物种红色名录》中青海湖裸鲤被列为濒危物种。
test: In 2004, the Chinese red list listed the naked carp in the Qinghai Lake as a threatened species.
new_mt: In 2004, the Chinese red list listed the naked carp in the Qinghai Lake as a threatened species.

src: 新华社昆明12月12日电（记者林碧锋）为持续做好脱贫人口就业帮扶，巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果，云南省日前出台促进乡村振兴乡村公益性岗位管理相关政策，助力全面推进乡村振兴。
test: Xinhua News Agency Kunming December 12, 2012 (reporter Lin Bifeng) to continue to do well in poverty alleviation and employment of the population, consolidate and expand the poverty alleviation and development achievements, Yunnan Province recently issued to promote rural revitalization and rural public welfare-related policy, to help the full implementation of rural revitalization.

src: 云南省人社厅有关负责人介绍，目前，云南共开发44.83万个乡村公益性岗位，用于安置脱贫劳动力等农村困难群体就业，在帮助脱贫群众实现就业增收、巩固脱贫攻坚成果、有效提升乡村各项公共服务能力等方面发挥重要作用。
test: The Department of Civil Affairs of Yunnan Province introduces the responsible person, at present, Yunnan has developed 44.83 million rural public welfare positions, which are used for the employment of poverty-stricken labor force and other rural difficult groups, and play an important role in helping poverty-stricken groups achieve employment income increase, consolidate poverty alleviation achievements, and effectively improve the public service capacity of rural areas.
new_mt: The Department of Civil Affairs of Yunnan Province introduces the responsible person, at present, Yunnan has developed 44.83 million rural public welfare positions, which are used for the employment of poverty-stricken labor force and other rural difficult groups, and play an important role in helping poverty-stricken groups achieve employment income increase, consolidate poverty alleviation achievements, and effectively improve the public service capacity of rural areas.

src: 此次新规由云南人社、乡村振兴、财政等七部门联合印发，主要对基层招聘乡村公益性岗位人员的对象范围、资金管理、岗位开发、岗位管理等方面进行统一规范。

src: 第三次越南国家数字技术企业发展论坛期间举行两场主要会议，讨论议题围绕着数字技术企业与国家数字化转型、数字技术企业与新冠肺炎疫情中和疫情后经济复苏与发展两大主题。
test: The third Vietnam Digital Technology Enterprise Development Forum was held in two sessions during the forum, discussing topics around digital technology enterprises and the digital transformation of the country, digital technology enterprises and the COVID-19 epidemic, and the post-epidemic economic recovery and development.
new_mt: The third Vietnam Digital Technology Enterprise Development Forum was held in two sessions during the forum, discussing topics around digital technology enterprises and the digital transformation of the country, digital technology enterprises and the COVID-19 epidemic, and the post-epidemic economic recovery and development.

src: 通信传媒部部长阮孟雄表示，2021年，尽管新冠肺炎疫情持续蔓延，但越南数字技术企业的数量和营业收入仍保持增长势头，达近10 % 。
test: The Minister of Information and Communications Nguyen Manh Hung said that in 2021, although the COVID-19 epidemic continued to spread, the number of digital technology enterprises in Vietnam and their revenue continued to grow, reaching nearly 10%.
new_mt: The Minister of Information and Communications Nguyen Manh Hung said that in 2021, although the COVID-19 epidemic continued to spread, the number of digital technology enterprises in Vietnam and their revenue continued to grow, reaching nearly 10%.

src: 2021年，越南典型数字产品数量耕作，集中解决越南面临的各大难题，许多数字产品已走出国门，越南数字技术排名已提升。
retrieved_src: 我国已是世界主要贸易国之一，但是走出国门的产品技术含量不高，一批沿海地区的企业代表说，实现企业的国际化乃至建设跨国企业集团，我们任重而道远。
retrieved_ref: China has become a major trading country in the world. However,the technological levels of Chinese products exported to foreign markets are low. Some deputies from enterprises in coastal areas said : We have heavy responsibilities and a long way to go before we can internationalize our enterprises and establish transnational enterprises and corporations.
new_mt: In 2021, Vietnam has been typical in digital products. It has concentrated on solving the problems faced by Vietnam, and many digital products have been exported. Vietnam's digital technology ranking has been improved.

src: 阮孟雄部长呼吁数字技术企业负起发展国家数字化转型平台的责任，担当发展这些国家数字平台的任务就是担当国家使命。
test: The Minister of Industry and Information Technology, Mr. Miao Wei, called on digital technology enterprises to shoulder the responsibility of developing the country's digital transformation platform, and to take on the mission of developing these national digital platforms.
new_mt: The Minister of Industry and Information Technology, Mr. Miao Wei, called on digital technology enterprises to shoulder the responsibility of developing the country's digital transformation platform, and to take on the mission of developing these national digital platforms.

src: 在论坛上，各部门和国家机关领导，正在研究、发展、应用、转让数字技术的企业、组织和个人分享了动员和汇集全社会资源来发展越南技术企业，携手推动国家数字化转型，朱慧疫情后经济复苏等的各突破性设想和解决方案。
test: In the forum, the leaders of the departments and the national authorities are studying, developing, applying and transferring digital technologies to the enterprises, organizations and individuals to mobilize and gather the resources of the whole society to develop Vietnamese technology enterprises, and to work together to promote the digital transformation of the country, to overcome the challenges after the epidemic of the economy and to revive.
new_mt: In the forum, the leaders of the departments and the national authorities are studying, developing, applying and transferring digital technologies to the enterprises, organizations and individuals to mobilize and gather the resources of the whole society to develop Vietnamese technology enterprises, and to work together to promote the digital transformation of the country, to overcome the challenges after the epidemic of the economy and to revive.

src: 范明正总理在论坛上发表讲话时强调，数字化转型是世界必由之路，是发展的客观需求。
test: The Prime Minister of China, Fan Mingzheng, emphasized in his speech at the forum that digital transformation is the inevitable path of the world, and the objective demand for development.
new_mt: The Prime Minister of China, Fan Mingzheng, emphasized in his speech at the forum that digital transformation is the inevitable path of the world, and the objective demand for development.

src: 数字化转型已成为全球性问题，数字化转型服务全民，因此需动员全民参与。
test: Digital transformation has become a global issue, digital transformation services are for all people, therefore we need to mobilize all people to participate.
new_mt: Digital transformation has become a global issue, digital transformation services are for all people, therefore we need to mobilize all people to participate.

src: 人民和企业是数字化转型的核心、主体、目标和动力。

new_mt: The people and enterprises are the core, subject, target and driving force of digital transformation.

src: 因此，一切政策需为了人民和企业。

new_mt: Therefore, all policies should be for the people and enterprises.

src: 范明正总理强调，数字化转型需体现民族精神，需以内力为主、战略、长期和决定性因素，外力为重要和突破口。
test: Premier Li Keqiang stressed that the digital transformation needs to reflect the national spirit, needs to be based on internal strength, with strategic, long-term and decisive factors, and external forces as important and breakthroughs.
new_mt: Premier Li Keqiang stressed that the digital transformation needs to reflect the national spirit, needs to be based on internal strength, with strategic, long-term and decisive factors, and external forces as important and breakthroughs.

src: 他同时认为，数字化转型需驱动向纵深发展和可持续发展，参与新冠肺炎疫情防控、经济复苏和发展、应对其后变化、克服自然资源枯竭现象，助力绿色转型、发展绿色能源。
test: He also believes that digital transformation needs to drive horizontal and deep development and sustainable development, participate in the prevention and control of the new crown pneumonia epidemic, economic recovery and development, and deal with changes after the epidemic, overcome the problem of resource depletion, and help green development and green energy development.
new_mt: He also believes that digital transformation needs to drive horizontal and deep development and sustainable development, participate in the prevention and control of the new crown pneumonia epidemic, economic recovery and development, and deal with changes after the epidemic, overcome the problem of resource depletion, and help green development and green energy development.

src: 数字化转型需参与保护和弘扬有关国家文化价值、历史传统、国家风土人情等的数据库建立工作，推动银行、税务、土地管理和开发数据库以及物流等领域数字化转型。
test: The digital transformation needs to involve the protection and promotion of the cultural values, traditions, and humanities of the country, as well as the establishment of databases for the protection of national cultural heritage, historical traditions, and national characteristics.
new_mt: The digital transformation needs to involve the protection and promotion of the cultural values, traditions, and humanities of the country, as well as the establishment of databases for the protection of national cultural heritage, historical traditions, and national characteristics.

src: 数字化转型的最大目标是让人民更幸福，国家日益繁荣发展。

test: 12th December 2021, “China International Railway and Equipment Manufacturing Talent Summit” was held in Changsha, Hunan Province.

src: 王成指出，举办人才峰会是贯彻落实中央人才工作会议和省第十二次党代会精神的重要举措，彰显了湖南重视人才、渴求人才、用好人才的真心诚意。
test: Wang Chengzhi pointed out that the talent summit is an important measure to implement the spirit of the Central Talent Work Conference and the 12th Provincial Party Congress, and it fully demonstrates Hunan's determination to use talents, pursue talents, and love talents.

src: 湖南有识才爱才敬才的优良传统、助力人才发展的广阔平台、实现美好生活的环境条件，近年来深入实施人才引领发展战略，以芙蓉人才行动计划为牵引，构建起引育留用全链条人才工作格局，成为了人才成长成就的沃土、创新创业的热土、宜居宜业的乐土。

src: 当前，湖南正在全面落实“三高四新”战略定位和使命任务，将进一步广开引贤纳才之门，为人才创新创业出台更优政策、集中更多资源、创造更好条件，期待各界优秀人才共同为湖南高质量发展聚智汇力。
test: At present, Hunan is fully implementing the strategic positioning and mission of "three highs and four new" and is striving to open the door to talents and attract talents. src: 第十七条 国家对注册消防工程师资格实行注册执业管理制度。
test: Article 17: The State implements a registration system for the qualification of fire engineering technicians.
new_mt: Article 17: The State implements a registration system for the qualification of fire engineering technicians.

src: 取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书的人员，经注册方可以相应级别注册消防工程师名义执业。
test: Persons who have obtained the first-class and second-class registration certificates of fire engineering engineers can be registered by the registration authority to practice as fire engineering engineers of the corresponding level.
new_mt: Persons who have obtained the first-class and second-class registration certificates of fire engineering engineers can be registered by the registration authority to practice as fire engineering engineers of the corresponding level.

src: 第十八条 公安部消防局是一级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批部门。
test: Article 18: The Ministry of Public Security Fire Department is a first-level registration of fire engineering qualification registration review unit.
new_mt: Article 18: The Ministry of Public Security Fire Department is a first-level registration of fire engineering qualification registration review unit.

src: 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构为二级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批部门，并负责一级注册消防工程师资格注册的初步审查工作。
test: The provincial public security fire brigade, the autonomous region, the direct-controlled city public security fire brigade is the second-level registration of fire engineering qualification registration review department, and is responsible for the initial review of the first-level registration of fire engineering qualification registration.
new_mt: The provincial public security fire brigade, the autonomous region, the direct-controlled city public security fire brigade is the second-level registration of fire engineering qualification registration review department, and is responsible for the initial review of the first-level registration of fire engineering qualification registration.

src: 第十九条 取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书并申请注册的人员，应当受聘于一个经批准的消防技术服务机构或者消防安全重点单位，并通过聘用单位向本单位所在地(聘用单位属企业的，通过本企业向工商注册所在地)的公安机关消防机构提交注册申请材料。
test: Article 19: Persons who have obtained the first-class and second-class registration certificates of fire engineering technicians and applied for registration shall be employed by a fire technology service organization or a fire safety key unit that has been approved by the competent authority.
new_mt: Article 19: Persons who have obtained the first-class and second-class registration certificates of fire engineering technicians and applied for registration shall be employed by a fire technology service organization or a fire safety key unit that has been approved by the competent authority.

src: 第二十条 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构在收到申请人的注册申请材料后，对申请材料不齐全或者不符合法定形式的，应当当场或者在5个工作日内，一次 性告知申请人需要补正的全部内容，逾期不告知的，自收到申请材料之日起即为受理。
test: Article 20: The public security and fire departments of the provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the Central Government shall, within five working days of receiving the application materials from the applicant, notify the applicant of any deficiencies in the application materials or any deficiencies in the application materials that do not conform to the legal form, and shall notify the applicant of the deficiencies in the application materials within five working days of receiving the application materials. If the notification is not made within the prescribed time limit, the application materials shall be deemed to have been accepted.
new_mt: Article 20: The public security and fire departments of the provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the Central Government shall, within five working days of receiving the application materials from the applicant, notify the applicant of any deficiencies in the application materials or any deficiencies in the application materials that do not conform to the legal form, and shall notify the applicant of the deficiencies in the application materials within five working days of receiving the application materials. If the notification is not made within the prescribed time limit, the application materials shall be deemed to have been accepted.

src: 对受理或者不予受理的注册申请，均应当出具加盖本级公安机关消防机构专用印章和注明日期的书面凭证。

src: 公安部消防局应当自收到省级公安机关消防机构报送的申请材料和初步审查意见之日起，20个工作日内作出是否批准的决定。
test: The fire department of the Ministry of Public Security should make a decision on whether to approve the application within 20 working days from the date of receipt of the application materials and the preliminary review opinions submitted by the provincial public security fire departments.
new_mt: The fire department of the Ministry of Public Security should make a decision on whether to approve the application within 20 working days from the date of receipt of the application materials and the preliminary review opinions submitted by the provincial public security fire departments.

src: 在规定的期限内不能作出批准决定的，应当将延长的期限和理由告知申请人。
test: The decision on the application should be made within the prescribed time limit. If it is not possible to make a decision within the prescribed time limit, the extension of the time limit and the reason should be notified to the applicant.
new_mt: The decision on the application should be made within the prescribed time limit. If it is not possible to make a decision within the prescribed time limit, the extension of the time limit and the reason should be notified to the applicant.

src: 对作出不予批准决定的，应当书面说明理由，并告知申请人享有依法申请行政复议或者提起行政诉讼的权利。

new_mt: When the administrative authority makes a decision not to approve the application, it shall give a written explanation of the reasons and notify the applicant of the right to apply for administrative reconsideration or to bring an administrative suit.

src: 第二十二条 注册审批部门应当自作出批准决定之日起10个工作日内，颁发、送达相应级别的注册证。
test: Article 22: The registration approval department shall, within 10 working days from the date of approval, issue the registration certificate.
new_mt: Article 22: The registration approval department shall, within 10 working days from the date of approval, issue the registration certificate.

src: 第二十三条 注册证的每一注册有效期为3年。
test: Article 23. The registration certificate is valid for 3 years.
new_mt: Article 23. The registration certificate is valid for 3 years.

src: 注册证在有效期内是相应级别注册消防工程师的执业凭证，由注册消防工程师本人保管、使用。
test: The registration certificate is valid within the validity period of the corresponding level of registration of fire engineering technicians, and is the practicing certificate of fire engineering technicians.
new_mt: The registration certificate is valid within the validity period of the corresponding level of registration of fire engineering technicians, and is the practicing certificate of fire engineering technicians.

src: 第二十四条 申请初始注册的，应当自取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书之日起1年内提出申请。
test: Article 24: The applicant for initial registration shall apply for registration within one year from the date of obtaining the first-class and second-class registration qualification certificate.
new_mt: Article 24: The applicant for initial registration shall apply for registration within one year from the date of obtaining the first-class and second-class registration qualification certificate.

src: 逾期申请初始注册时，须符合本规定继续教育要求。
test: When applying for initial registration, the applicant must meet the continuing education requirements.
new_mt: When applying for initial registration, the applicant must meet the continuing education requirements.

src: 初始注册、延续注册、变更注册、注销注册和不予注册等注册管理的具体办法，由公安部另行规定。
test: The specific measures for registration management, including initial registration, renewal registration, change registration, cancellation registration and non-registration, are formulated by the public security department.
new_mt: The specific measures for registration management, including initial registration, renewal registration, change registration, cancellation registration and non-registration, are formulated by the public security department.

src: 第二十五条 继续教育是注册消防工程师延续注册、重新注册和逾期初始注册的必备条件。
test: Article 25 Continuing education is a necessary condition for the renewal of registration, re-registration and re-registration of registered fire engineers.
new_mt: Article 25 Continuing education is a necessary condition for the renewal of registration, re-registration and re-registration of registered fire engineers.

src: 在每个注册有效期内，各级别注册消防工程师应当按照规定完成相应的继续教育。
test: During the validity period of each level of registration, the fire engineering technicians at each level should complete the corresponding continuing education in accordance with the regulations.
new_mt: During the validity period of each level of registration, the fire engineering technicians at each level should complete the corresponding continuing education in accordance with the regulations.

src: 第二十六条 注册审批部门应当及时向社会公告注册消防工程师注册有关情况，建立注册消防工程师诚信档案，对其执业活动实行信用管理。
test: Article 26: The registration and approval department shall timely publicize the registration of fire engineering technicians, establish a credit record of fire engineering technicians, and implement credit management of their business activities.
new_mt: Article 26: The registration and approval department shall timely publicize the registration of fire engineering technicians, establish a credit record of fire engineering technicians, and implement credit management of their business activities.

src: 第二十七条 各级注册消防工程师资格的注册管理部门，应当严格执行《中华人民共和国行政许可法》有关规定。
test: Article 27 Each level of the registration management department of the fire engineering technician qualification shall strictly implement the relevant provisions of the Administrative Licensing Law of the People's Republic of China.
new_mt: Article 27 Each level of the registration management department of the fire engineering technician qualification shall strictly implement the relevant provisions of the Administrative Licensing Law of the People's Republic of China.

src: 中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习圆满结束-新华网
test: China-Vietnam Joint Military Drill “Peace and Friendship-2021” Concludes Successfully-Xinhua
new_mt: China-Vietnam Joint Military Drill “Peace and Friendship-2021” Concludes Successfully-Xinhua

src: 新华社河内12月12日电（周娜 滕怀金）12日上午，参加中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习的中方参演分队全部安全返回中国广西境内，标志着此次持续7天的演训任务顺利完成。
retrieved_src: 由成都军区副司令员傅秉耀率领的中国人民解放军边境军区代表团是17日抵达河内对越南进行友好访问的。
retrieved_ref: The PLA border military district delegation led by Fu Bingyao,deputy commander of the Chengdu Military Region arrived in Honoi for a friendly visit on 17 July.
new_mt: The Chinese delegation to the joint exercise "Peace and Rescue-2021" between the Chinese and Vietnamese armies safely returned to China on 12 December.

src: 此次联演，中越两军围绕人道主义医学救援这一重大课题，紧扣卫勤救死扶伤使命任务，按照实战化标准完成了联合卫勤指挥、联合现场救援、批量伤员处置等课目内容，有效提升了两军卫勤保障能力。
test: This time, the joint exercise between the Chinese and Vietnamese armies focused on humanitarian medical rescue, and the two armies closely followed the mission of rescue, relief, and treatment of the wounded. According to the standard of real combat, the joint command of rescue, the joint rescue on the spot, and the mass treatment of the wounded were completed, effectively improving the joint rescue capabilities of the two armies.
new_mt: This time, the joint exercise between the Chinese and Vietnamese armies focused on humanitarian medical rescue, and the two armies closely followed the mission of rescue, relief, and treatment of the wounded. According to the standard of real combat, the joint command of rescue, the joint rescue on the spot, and the mass treatment of the wounded were completed, effectively improving the joint rescue capabilities of the two armies.

src: 演习成果得到中越两军的肯定。
test: The results of the joint exercises between the Chinese and Vietnamese armies have been recognized by both sides.
new_mt: The results of the joint exercises between the Chinese and Vietnamese armies have been recognized by both sides.

src: 越方演习指导委员会主任、越南人民军后勤总局副主任兼参谋长阮雄胜在演习结束仪式上说，通过此次演习，越南军医从中国军医身上学到了演习组织及专业活动方面的知识，也见识了中方的医疗、保障设备。
retrieved_src: 藉着跟不同国籍、不同背景的军事将领、学者专家、政府官员、文艺工作者……的谈话，我可以学到好多好多东西，对增长见识、开阔视界很有帮助。’
retrieved_ref: We train a person from many different aspects.
new_mt: The Vietnamese People’s Army Medical Department has learned a lot from the Chinese People’s Liberation Army Medical Department.

src: 演习取得的成果证明了两国军医力量在医疗援助、疫情防控方面的专业能力。
test: The results obtained through the drill demonstrated the professional capabilities of the two countries in medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.
new_mt: The results obtained through the drill demonstrated the professional capabilities of the two countries in medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.

src: 中方指导协调组组长、中央军委后勤保障部卫生局副局长陈春明表示，此次演习是在2018年成功举办联合义诊活动的基础上又一次开拓创新实践，具有非常重要的里程碑意义。
retrieved_src: 昨日这项会议，调查局还特别邀请陆委会副主委邓振中、经济部国贸局第三组组长杨珍妮等政府官员授课，针对多项议题做重点提示。
retrieved_ref: Besides,the Investigation Bureau specially invited MAC Vice Chairman Teng Chen-chung and Yang Chen-ni,head of the Third Group of the National Trade Bureau under the Ministry of Finance,to yesterday 's meeting. The two gave lessons to the participating government officials,and briefed the latter on the main points of a number of related subjects.
new_mt: Chen Chun-ming,head of the Coordination Group of the Central Military Commission Logistics Department and deputy director of the Health Bureau of the Central Military Commission,said that this exercise is a new exploration and innovation based on the successful holding of the joint medical exercise in 2018. It has a very important milestone significance.

src: 演习期间，中国人民解放军向越南人民军捐赠了医用防护口罩、医用防护服、快速核酸检测仪器等卫生防疫物资。
test: During the training period, the Chinese People's Liberation Army donated medical protective masks, medical protective clothing, and rapid nucleic acid testing equipment to the Vietnamese People's Army.
new_mt: During the training period, the Chinese People's Liberation Army donated medical protective masks, medical protective clothing, and rapid nucleic acid testing equipment to the Vietnamese People's Army.
